text: This review relates in particular to my experience of the ‚ÄòDone for you migration‚Äô. I was let down time and time again in terms of quality, reliability, and communication. There were no processes in place whatsoever, no clear roadmap, a lack of professionalism and skills - and as a result plenty of targets were missed and mistakes made.Worst of all though was the amount of time I ended up having to spend on it...I was left to basically manage the project, communicating with a 'team' of people  who were incredibly unprofessional and lacked skills too.I wanted to discuss my experience and offered to provide feedback to Stockton as a courtesy before posting this review. Expecting any business owner to show an interest in learning and improving, I was met instead with a very inflexible schedule and no real willingness to make use of this offer. It seems to me he doesn't really care, and just palms the migrations off to a 2nd rate team of freelancers who have no processes to follow, very little knowledge and training in the tasks they need to do, and terrible customer service (besides saying sorry a lot, which doesn't count for much after a while).As excited as I was about this service at the start of this process I honestly cannot recommend the ‚ÄòDone for you migration service‚Äô on offer here.
